content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = '[DimCustomersStaging]' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = '[dbo]')
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimCustomersStaging]
	(
	 [CustomerID] nvarchar(4000),
	 [LastName] nvarchar(4000),
	 [FirstName] nvarchar(4000),
	 [AddressLine1] nvarchar(4000),
	 [AddressLine2] nvarchar(4000),
	 [City] nvarchar(4000),
	 [State] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ZipCode] nvarchar(4000),
	 [PhoneNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	 [SourceSystemId] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 HEAP
	 -- CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_[DimCustomersStaging]
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO [dbo].[DimCustomersStaging]
(CustomerID 1, LastName 2, FirstName 3, AddressLine1 4, AddressLine2 5, City 6, State 7, ZipCode 8, PhoneNumber 9, SourceSystemId 10)
FROM 'https://datalakesouthridgerbr.dfs.core.windows.net/conformed/customers/*.snappy.parquet'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[DimCustomersStaging]
GO
